sk1.name: Thunder Strike
sk1.desc: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning. Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.

sk2.name: Glimpse
sk2.desc: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago. Instantly kills illusions.

sk3.name: Kinetic Field
sk3.desc: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

sk4.name: Static Storm
sk4.desc:
Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
